doc:
Marion Hutton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marion_Hutton 0 Marion Hutton (born Marion Thornburg; March 10, 1919 – January 10, 1987) was an American singer and actress. She is best remembered for her singing with the Glenn Miller Orchestra from 1938–1942. She was the sister of actress and singer Betty Hutton. Marion_Hutton ( born Marion_Thornburg ; March_10_,_1919 – January_10_,_1987 ) was an_American_singer_and_actress . She is_best_remembered for her_singing with the_Glenn_Miller_Orchestra from 1938 – 1942 . She was the_sister of actress_and_singer_Betty_Hutton .
